name: Metropolitan areas with the largest number of workers in S&E occupations: 2019
description: Metropolitan areas with the largest number of workers in S&E occupations: 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_metropolitan_workforce_in_s_e_occupations_as_a_percentage_of_national_total_in_s_e_occupations_
variableMeasured.description: Metropolitan Workforce In S E Occupations As A Percentage Of National Total In S E Occupations

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: The data exclude metropolitan statistical areas where S&E proportions were suppressed. Larger metropolitan areas are broken into component metropolitan divisions. Ranking is based on the estimated number of workers in S&E occupations. Differences between any two areas may not be statistically significant.
sources: Bureau of Labor Statistics, special tabulations (2020) of the 2019 Occupational Employment Statistics Survey.Science and Engineering Indicators
